thread.title: David Beckham Shows Off Giant New Rose Neck Tattoo
thread.title_full: David Beckham Shows Off Giant New Rose Neck Tattoo

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: David Beckham Shows Off Giant New Rose Neck Tattoo
text:
Comments David was spotted sporting a large rose tattoo etched on his neck just above his 'Pretty Lady, Harper' tattoo. 
Tattoo lover David Beckham has just debuted a brand new ink allegedly dedicated to his little daughter Harper. The former soccer player was spotted sporting a large rose ink etched on his neck. Just below the new addition into his ever-growing collection was the "Pretty Lady Harper" ink that he first revealed back in summer. David's wife Victoria Adams treated fans to the picture of her topless husband relaxing under the sun on a lounger on Thursday, October 22. "Happy Friday x kisses from Los Angeles," the singer-turned-fashion designer captioned the sizzling black and white Instagram shot. A photo posted by Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) on Oct 22, 2015 at 7:47pm PDT Over the summer, David shared a selfie on his Instagram page that showed him sporting the "Pretty Lady, Harper" tattoo. At that time, he captioned the image with, "Hey Pretty Lady ❤.... Just adding to the collection of tattoos that mean so much to me... Thanks Mark as always looks amazing ... @shamrocksocialclub." A photo posted by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Jul 26, 2015 at 2:41pm PDT
